name: AzureResourceGroupDeployment
description: Deploy, start, stop, delete Azure Resource Groups
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure subscription for the deployment. Supported Azure service connections are of the authentication type of Credentials or Service Principals.

inputs.name: action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Action to be performed on the Azure resources or resource group.

inputs.name: resourceGroupName
inputs.label: Resource Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of the resource group.

inputs.name: location
inputs.label: Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Location for deploying the resource group. If an existing resource group is updated, then this will be ignored.
inputs.visibleRule: action = Create Or Update Resource Group

inputs.name: csmFile
inputs.label: Template
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path to the Azure Resource Manager template. For more information on templates see - http://aka.ms/azuretemplates.
inputs.visibleRule: action = Create Or Update Resource Group

inputs.name: csmParametersFile
inputs.label: Template Parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path for the parameters file corresponding to the Azure Resource Manager Template.
inputs.visibleRule: action = Create Or Update Resource Group

inputs.name: overrideParameters
inputs.label: Override Template Parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify the template parameters to be overridden in the format like,
–storageName azurerg –adminUsername $(vmusername) –azureKeyVaultName $(fabrikamFibre)
inputs.visibleRule: action = Create Or Update Resource Group
